וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֥ף <WH639> And the anger יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֞ם <WH5414> and he delivered בְּיַ֣ד ׀ <WH3027> them into the hand חֲזָאֵ֣ל <WH2371> of Hazael מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king אֲרָ֗ם <WH758> of Syria וּבְיַ֛ד <WH3027> and into the hand בֶּן־ הֲדַ֥ד <WH1130> of Benhadad בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֲזָאֵ֖ל <WH2371> of Hazael כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> all [their] days

וַיְחַ֥ל <WH2470> besought יְהוֹאָחָ֖ז <WH3059> And Jehoahaz אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> unto יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> hearkened אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> and to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> how רָאָה֙ <WH7200> him for he saw אֶת־ <WH853> לַ֣חַץ <WH3906> the oppression יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> how לָחַ֥ץ <WH3905> oppressed אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> because the king אֲרָֽם׃ <WH758> of Syria

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> gave יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> (And the LORD לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel מוֹשִׁ֔יעַ <WH3467> a saviour וַיֵּ֣צְא֔וּ <WH3318> so that they went out מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under יַד־ <WH3027> from under the hand אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> of the Syrians וַיֵּשְׁב֧וּ <WH3427> dwelt בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּאָהֳלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH168> in their tents כִּתְמ֥וֹל <WH8543> before שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <WH8032> before that time

וֶֽאֱלִישָׁע֙ <WH477> Now Elisha חָלָ֣ה <WH2470> was fallen sick אֶת־ <WH854> with חָלְי֔וֹ <WH2483> of his sickness אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> of which יָמ֖וּת <WH4191> whereof he died בּ֑וֹ וַיֵּ֨רֶד <WH3381> came down אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> and יוֹאָ֣שׁ <WH3101> And Joash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֵּ֤בְךְּ <WH1058> unto him and wept עַל־ <WH5921> over פָּנָיו֙ <WH6440> over his face וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said אָבִ֣י ׀ <WH1> O my father אָבִ֔י <WH1> my father רֶ֥כֶב <WH7393> the chariot יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וּפָרָשָֽׁיו׃ <WH6571> and the horsemen

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said פְּתַ֧ח <WH6605> Open הַחַלּ֛וֹן <WH2474> the window קֵ֖דְמָה <WH6924> eastward וַיִּפְתָּ֑ח <WH6605> And he opened וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלִישָׁ֤ע <WH477> [it] Then Elisha יְרֵה֙ <WH3384> Shoot וַיּ֔וֹר <WH3384> And he shot וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said חֵץ־ <WH2671> The arrow תְּשׁוּעָ֤ה <WH8668> deliverance לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD'S וְחֵ֣ץ <WH2671> and the arrow תְּשׁוּעָ֣ה <WH8668> of deliverance בַֽאֲרָ֔ם <WH758> from Syria וְהִכִּיתָ֧ <WH5221> for thou shalt smite אֶת־ <WH853> אֲרָ֛ם <WH758> the Syrians בַּאֲפֵ֖ק <WH663> in Aphek עַד־ <WH5704> until כַּלֵּֽה׃ <WH3615> till thou have consumed

וַיִּקְצֹ֨ף <WH7107> was wroth עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> So אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> with him and said לְהַכּ֨וֹת <WH5221> Thou shouldest have smitten חָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> five אוֹ־ <WH176> or שֵׁשׁ֙ <WH8337> or six פְּעָמִ֔ים <WH6471> times אָ֛ז <WH227> then הִכִּ֥יתָ <WH5221> then hadst thou smitten אֶת־ <WH853> אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> Syria עַד־ <WH5704> until כַּלֵּ֑ה <WH3615> till thou hadst consumed וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three פְּעָמִ֖ים <WH6471> times תַּכֶּ֥ה <WH5221> [it] whereas now thou shalt smite אֶת־ <WH853> אֲרָֽם׃ <WH758> Syria ס
